==================== START: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/lims-domain-model-tmpl.yaml ====================
lims_domain_model:
  entities:
    Sample:
      fields:
        sample_id: "string"
        type: "string"
        collection_time: "datetime"
        subject_id: "string"
        status: "enum(received, processing, stored, disposed)"
      relations:
        - name: "belongs_to"
          target: "Batch"
    Batch:
      fields:
        batch_id: "string"
        project_id: "string"
        received_date: "date"
      relations:
        - name: "has_many"
          target: "Sample"
    Test:
      fields:
        test_id: "string"
        method: "string"
        instrument_id: "string"
        status: "enum(pending, running, complete, failed)"
      relations:
        - name: "performed_on"
          target: "Sample"
    Result:
      fields:
        result_id: "string"
        test_id: "string"
        analyte: "string"
        value: "number"
        unit: "string"
        flags: "string"
  constraints:
    - "sample.sample_id unique"
    - "result.test_id references test.test_id"
==================== END: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/lims-domain-model-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/karyotype-report-tmpl.md ====================

{{methods}}

## ÁªìÊûú

{{results}}

## Âà§ÂÆö‰∏éÂª∫ËÆÆ

{{judgement}}

  target_tissue: "{{tissue}}"
  cqas: ["{{cqa}}"]
  materials: ["{{material}}"]
  porosity: "{{porosity}}"
  pore_size: "{{pore_size}}"
  anisotropy: "{{anisotropy}}"
  degradation_profile: "{{degradation}}"
  mechanical_targets: "{{mechanical}}"
  mass_transfer: "{{permeability}}"
  failure_rules: ["{{stop_rules}}"]

  rheology: "{{rheology_targets}}"

      factors: ["{{factor}}"]

      shear: "{{shear}}"
      notes: "{{notes}}"

ÁõÆÁöÑÔºöÊåâÈ°πÁõÆÈÄâÊã©Âª∫Â∫ìÊñπÊ°àÔºàWGS/WES/RNA/UMI/ATAC/scRNAÔºâÔºåÂàÜÈÖçÊù°Á†Å‰∏éÊâπÊ¨°ÈöèÊú∫ÂåñÔºåÂÆö‰πâÈò¥/Èò≥ÊÄß‰∏é‰∫§ÂèâÊ±°ÊüìÁõëÊéß„ÄÇ

==================== START: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/sample-intake-form-tmpl.yaml ====================
sample_intake:
  project: "{{project}}"
  samples:
    - id: "{{sample_id}}"
      type: "DNA|RNA|Cells|Tissue"
      volume: "{{ul}}"
      concentration: "{{ng_per_ul}}"
      condition: "dry ice|ice|LN2"
      received_at: "{{datetime}}"
      anomalies: "{{notes}}"
==================== END: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/sample-intake-form-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/library-design-tmpl.yaml ====================
library_design:
  assay: "WGS|WES|RNA|scRNA|ATAC|cfDNA|LowPass"
  read_length: "2x150|2x100|1D"
  indexes: "dual|single|UMI"
  batch_randomization: true
  controls:
    positive: "{{pos_ctrl}}"
    negative: "{{neg_ctrl}}"
  contamination_monitoring: ["index-hopping", "cross-talk"]
==================== END: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/library-design-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/run-plan-tmpl.yaml ====================
run_plan:
  platform: "Illumina|ONT"
  flowcell: "{{model}}"
  read_length: "{{read}}"
  lanes:
    - lane: 1
      samples: ["{{sample_id}}"]
      spikein_phix: "{{percent}}"
  targets:
    coverage: "{{x}}"
    q30: ">=85%?"
==================== END: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/run-plan-tmpl.yaml ====================

sample_receipt_and_fixation:
  project: "{{project}}"
  samples:
    - id: "{{sample_id}}"
      tissue: "{{tissue}}"
      fixative: "10% NBF|PFA|Others"
      ratio_tissue_to_fixative: "1:10"
      time_to_fix: "{{minutes}}"
      fixation_time: "{{hours}}"
      temperature: "{{temp}}"
      anomalies: "{{notes}}"
  coi_coc: true
==================== END: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/sample-receipt-and-fixation-tmpl.yaml ====================

  dehydration: ["70%", "80%", "95%", "100%"]
  clearing: ["xylene|substitute"]
  paraffin: "{{temp}}"
  embedding_orientation: "{{orientation}}"
  section_thickness_um: "{{thickness}}"
  storage: "{{conditions}}"

  primary_antibody: "{{clone}} @ {{dilution}}"
  detection_system: "{{HRP/DAB|AP/FastRed}}"
  controls: ["positive tissue", "isotype", "competition"]
  acceptance: "{{criteria}}"

  fluors: ["{{fluor1}}", "{{fluor2}}", "{{fluor3}}"]

      ex_em: "{{ex}}/{{em}}"
      laser_power: "{{mW}}"
      exposure_ms: "{{exp}}"
      pinhole_AU: "{{pinhole}}"
  sampling: { pixel_size_nm: "{{px}}", z_step_um: "{{z}}", averaging: "{{avg}}" }
  live_cell: { temp: "{{temp}}", CO2: "{{co2}}", humidity: "{{humidity}}" }

# Âõ∫ÂÆö/Â§ÑÁêÜÊ∏ÖÂçï

- ÂèñÊùê/Âõ∫ÂÆöÊó∂Èó¥‰∏é‰ΩìÁßØÊØî
- ËÑ±Ê∞¥/ÈÄèÊòé/Êµ∏Ëú°ÂèÇÊï∞

==================== START: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/quarantine-plan-tmpl.yaml ====================
quarantine_plan:
  scope: "Incoming materials and equipment"
  conditions:
    status_label: "QUARANTINE"
    storage_location: "Quarantine cage/room/shelf"
  release_criteria:
    - "COA verified"
    - "Visual inspection pass"
    - "Temperature logger in range"
  nonconformance_actions:
    - "Segregate and label NONCONFORMING"
    - "Notify QA and supplier"
    - "Create deviation record"
  records:
    form: "Quarantine Log"
    retained_years: 10
  responsibilities:
    owner: "Warehouse/EHS/QA"
  approvals:
    released_by_role: "QA"
==================== END: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/quarantine-plan-tmpl.yaml ====================

  method: "soiled bedding|contact"
  frequency: "quarterly"
  room_coverage: "{{rooms}}"
  agents: ["MNV", "MPV", "MHV", "Sendai", "Pinworm"]
  reporting: "summary + actions"

    - id: "{{room}}"
      level: "SPF|SPF/BSL2"
      pressure_setpoint_Pa: "{{delta}}"
      ach: "{{air_changes}}"
      flow: "single-pass|recirc with HEPA"
  flows: ["personnel", "materials", "waste"]

==================== START: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/colony-breeding-plan-tmpl.yaml ====================
colony_breeding_plan:
  species: "Mouse|Rat"
  strains: ["C57BL/6J"]
  founder_pairs: 5
  mating_scheme: "monogamous|harem"
  genotyping:
    method: "PCR"
    schedule_days_postnatal: [14, 21]
    markers: ["GeneX"]
  health_monitoring:
    sentinel_frequency_weeks: 12
    pathogens_panel: ["MHV", "Sendai"]
  weaning_age_days: 21
  census:
    frequency_weeks: 1
    records_required: ["DOB", "Sex", "Genotype", "Cage ID"]
  capacity_limits:
    max_cage_per_room: 200
  disposition:
    surplus_policy: "adoption|transfer|euthanasia"
  approvals:
    iacuc_protocol: "{{protocol_id}}"
    valid_until: "{{date}}"
==================== END: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/colony-breeding-plan-tmpl.yaml ====================

  checksums: true
  directory_layout: "{{layout}}"
  required_metadata: ["project", "sample_id", "assay", "run_id", "coi", "coc"]

multiqc:
  include_modules: ["fastqc", "qualimap", "samtools", "custom"]
  gates: { Q30: ">=85", coverage: ">=30x" }
  outliers: { method: "IQR", factor: 1.5 }

==================== START: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/container-lockfile-tmpl.yaml ====================
containers:
  - name: "{{tool}}"
    image: "{{registry}}/{{repo}}:{{tag}}"
    digest: "{{sha256}}"
    provenance: "{{builder}}"
==================== END: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/container-lockfile-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/scheduler-profile-tmpl.yaml ====================
scheduler:
  backend: "SLURM|K8s"
  queues:
    - name: "highmem"
      cpu: 32
      mem: "256G"
      preemptible: false
    - name: "spot"
      cpu: 16
      mem: "64G"
      preemptible: true
  logging: "centralized"
==================== END: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/scheduler-profile-tmpl.yaml ====================

  conflict_resolution: "latest-signed"

ËåÉÂõ¥/ÂΩ±ÂìçËØÑ‰º∞ ‚Üí ËøÅÁßªËÑöÊú¨ ‚Üí Êï∞ÊçÆÂ§á‰ªΩ‰∏éÂõûÊªö ‚Üí È™åËØÅ‰∏éÁ≠æÁΩ≤ ‚Üí ÂèòÊõ¥ËÆ∞ÂΩï„ÄÇ

==================== START: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/rbac-policy-tmpl.yaml ====================
rbac:
  roles:
    - name: "Operator"
      rights: ["read", "create_own"]
    - name: "Reviewer"
      rights: ["read", "review", "sign"]
    - name: "Admin"
      rights: ["all"]
  separation_of_duties:
    - ["Operator", "Reviewer"]
  least_privilege: true
==================== END: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/rbac-policy-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/esign-policy-tmpl.yaml ====================
esign:
  multi_factor: true
  signature_components: ["user_id", "meaning", "time", "reason"]
  certificate: "internal|external CA"
  non_repudiation: true
  retention_years: 15
==================== END: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/esign-policy-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/instrument-interface-spec-tmpl.yaml ====================
instrument_interface:
  instrument: "{{name}}"
  method: "API|File|SCPI|OPC-UA|Serial"
  mapping: { source_field: "dest_field", unit: "{{unit}}", transform: "{{fn}}" }
  errors: ["retry", "quarantine", "alert"]
  reconciliation: true
==================== END: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/instrument-interface-spec-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/middleware-contract-tmpl.yaml ====================
middleware:
  transport: "AMQP|Kafka|REST"
  topics: ["lims.events", "instrument.results"]
  schema_registry: true
  retries_backoff: "exponential"
  dlq: true
==================== END: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/middleware-contract-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/barcode-and-label-spec-tmpl.yaml ====================
barcode_label:
  schemes:
    - entity: "Sample"
      prefix: "S"
      format: "S-YYYY-####"
      symbology: "DataMatrix"
    - entity: "Batch"
      prefix: "B"
      format: "B-YYYYMM-#####"
      symbology: "Code128"
  label_layout: { width_mm: 25, height_mm: 10, fields: ["id", "name", "expiry"] }
  print_quality: ">=300dpi"
==================== END: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/barcode-and-label-spec-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/calibration-plan-tmpl.yaml ====================
calibration_plan:
  instruments:
    - sensor: "{{sensor}}"
      location: "{{location}}"
      range: "{{range}}"
      accuracy: "{{accuracy}}"
  intervals_months: 12
  standards_traceability: "NMI/NIST"
  acceptance_criteria: "{{criteria}}"
  as_found_as_left: true
  environmental_conditions:
    temperature_c: "20-24"
    humidity_percent: "40-60"
  records: true
  approvals:
    prepared_by: "name/signature/date"
    reviewed_by: "name/signature/date"
    approved_by: "name/signature/date"
==================== END: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/calibration-plan-tmpl.yaml ====================

  frequencies: ["daily", "weekly", "monthly"]
  thresholds: "see thresholds table"
  actions_on_alarm: ["quarantine", "root cause", "retest"]

      symbology: "Code128"

==================== START: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/biosafety-risk-assessment-tmpl.yaml ====================
template:
  id: biosafety-risk-assessment-v1
  name: Biosafety Risk Assessment
  version: 1.0
  output:
    format: markdown
    filename: docs/biosafety-risk-assessment.md
    title: "Biosafety È£éÈô©ËØÑ‰º∞Ôºö{{project_title}}"
workflow:
  mode: interactive
  elicitation: advanced-elicitation
sections:
  - id: hazards
    title: Âç±ÂÆ≥ËØÜÂà´
    instruction: ËØÜÂà´ÁîüÁâ©/ÂåñÂ≠¶/Áâ©ÁêÜÂç±ÂÆ≥‰∏éÊö¥Èú≤Ë∑ØÂæÑ„ÄÅÈ¢ëÂ∫¶‰∏éÂêéÊûúÂàÜÁ∫ß„ÄÇ
    elicit: true
  - id: controls
    title: ÊéßÂà∂Â±ÇÁ∫ß
    instruction: ÊèêÂá∫Ê∂àÈô§/Êõø‰ª£/Â∑•Á®ã/Ë°åÊîø/PPEÊéßÂà∂ÔºåÂπ∂ËØÑ‰º∞ÊÆã‰ΩôÈ£éÈô©„ÄÇ
    elicit: true
  - id: monitoring
    title: ÁõëÊµã‰∏éÊºîÁªÉ
    instruction: Âà∂ÂÆöÁõëÊµãÊåáÊ†á‰∏éÊºîÁªÉËÆ°ÂàíÔºåÂÆö‰πâËß¶ÂèëÈòàÂÄº‰∏é‰∏äÊä•ÊµÅÁ®ã„ÄÇ

==================== START: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/lims-domain-model-tmpl.yaml ====================
lims_domain_model:
  entities:
    Sample:
      fields:
        sample_id: "string"
        type: "string"
        collection_time: "datetime"
        subject_id: "string"
        status: "enum(received, processing, stored, disposed)"
      relations:
        - name: "belongs_to"
          target: "Batch"
    Batch:
      fields:
        batch_id: "string"
        project_id: "string"
        received_date: "date"
      relations:
        - name: "has_many"
          target: "Sample"
    Test:
      fields:
        test_id: "string"
        method: "string"
        instrument_id: "string"
        status: "enum(pending, running, complete, failed)"
      relations:
        - name: "performed_on"
          target: "Sample"
    Result:
      fields:
        result_id: "string"
        test_id: "string"
        analyte: "string"
        value: "number"
        unit: "string"
        flags: "string"
  constraints:
    - "sample.sample_id unique"
    - "result.test_id references test.test_id"
==================== END: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/lims-domain-model-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/lims-eln-spec-tmpl.yaml ====================
lims_eln_spec:
  authentication:
    type: "SAML2|OIDC"
  e_signature:
    part11_compliant: true
    signing_reason_required: true
  rbac:
    roles: ["Operator", "Reviewer", "Approver", "Admin"]
  records:
    audit_trail: true
    retention_years: 15
  integrations:
    instruments:
      - name: "{{instrument}}"
        protocol: "OPC-UA|Serial|CSV"
        direction: "unidirectional|bidirectional"
    storage:
      - type: "S3|NFS"
        encryption: "AES-256"
  barcoding:
    symbologies: ["Code128", "DataMatrix"]
  label_templates:
    default:
      size: "25x50mm"
      fields: ["sample_id", "batch_id", "expiry"]
==================== END: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/lims-eln-spec-tmpl.yaml ====================

      description: "{{desc}}"
      quantity: 1
      uom: "EA"
      grade: "GMP|Research"
      storage: "Ambient|2-8C|-20C|-80C|LN2"
      hazardous: false
      justification: "{{reason}}"

    levels:
      - role: "PI/Manager"
      - role: "QA"
      - role: "Finance"

    coa_required: true
    temperature_monitor: "if cold-chain"

==================== START: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/quarantine-plan-tmpl.yaml ====================
quarantine_plan:
  scope: "Incoming materials and equipment"
  conditions:
    status_label: "QUARANTINE"
    storage_location: "Quarantine cage/room/shelf"
  release_criteria:
    - "COA verified"
    - "Visual inspection pass"
    - "Temperature logger in range"
  nonconformance_actions:
    - "Segregate and label NONCONFORMING"
    - "Notify QA and supplier"
    - "Create deviation record"
  records:
    form: "Quarantine Log"
    retained_years: 10
  responsibilities:
    owner: "Warehouse/EHS/QA"
  approvals:
    released_by_role: "QA"
==================== END: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/quarantine-plan-tmpl.yaml ====================

  grade: "GMP|Research|Xeno-free"

==================== START: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/rbac-policy-tmpl.yaml ====================
rbac:
  roles:
    - name: "Operator"
      rights: ["read", "create_own"]
    - name: "Reviewer"
      rights: ["read", "review", "sign"]
    - name: "Admin"
      rights: ["all"]
  separation_of_duties:
    - ["Operator", "Reviewer"]
  least_privilege: true
==================== END: .bmad-regbio-lab-expansion-pack/templates/rbac-policy-tmpl.yaml ====================

  - id: populations
    title: ‰∫∫Áæ§ÈõÜÂÆö‰πâ
    instruction: ÂÆö‰πâ FAS/PPS/ÂÆâÂÖ®ÈõÜ‰∏éÁ∫≥ÊéíÊ†áÂáÜ„ÄÇ
    elicit: true

## Purpose

Âª∫Á´ãÂπ¥Â∫¶/Â≠£Â∫¶ÂÆûÈ™åÂÆ§ËøêËê•‰∏éË¥®ÈáèÁõÆÊ†áÔºàÂÆâÂÖ®„ÄÅË¥®Èáè„ÄÅ‰∫§‰ªò„ÄÅÊàêÊú¨„ÄÅÂêàËßÑÔºâÔºåËæìÂá∫„ÄäLab‚ÄëOps‚ÄëPlan„Äã‰∏éKPIÂü∫Á∫ø„ÄÇ

- Áé∞Ë°åSOPÊ∏ÖÂçï„ÄÅÈ£éÈô©ËØÑ‰º∞„ÄÅËÆæÂ§á‰∏éÂüπËÆ≠Âè∞Ë¥¶„ÄÅÂ∫ìÂ≠òÊä•Ë°®

## Purpose

ÊääÁ†îÁ©∂ÈóÆÈ¢òÂàÜËß£‰∏∫ÂèØÊ£ÄÈ™åÂÅáËÆæÔºå‰∫ßÂá∫ÂÆûÈ™åËÆæËÆ°ËìùÂõæÔºàÂèòÈáè„ÄÅÂØπÁÖß„ÄÅÁõ≤Ê≥ï„ÄÅÈöèÊú∫Âåñ„ÄÅÊ†∑Êú¨ÈáèÔºâ„ÄÇ

1. ÈÄâÊã©ËÆæËÆ°ÔºöÂπ≥Ë°åÁªÑ/‰∫§Âèâ/ÈÖçÂØπ/ÂàÜÂ±Ç/Âõ†Â≠êËÆæËÆ°/ÂìçÂ∫îÈù¢„ÄÇ
2. Á°ÆÂÆö‰∏ªË¶Å/Ê¨°Ë¶ÅÁªàÁÇπ‰∏éÊïàÂ∫îÈáèÊåáÊ†áÔºàÂèäÊúÄÂ∞è‰∏¥Â∫äÈáçË¶ÅÂ∑Æ MCIDÔºâ„ÄÇ

4. ‰ΩøÁî® `calc-power` ËÆ°ÁÆóÊ†∑Êú¨Èáè‰∏éÂäüÊïàÔºåËÆ∞ÂΩïÂÅáËÆæ‰∏éÂèÇÊï∞Êù•Ê∫ê„ÄÇ
